activity_text: Run in the park. Pick the closest park to your house and start first by fast walking. You have to build up your resistance gradually.
advice_quote: If you spend your whole life waiting for the storm, youâ€™ll never enjoy the sunshine. -Morris West

activity_text: Getting your hands dirty can do a world of good. Plus you will get a sense of accomplishment that will definitely lift up your mood. One you start doing it, you will start feeling a natural high as you progress. Stick with it.
